text:
dv01 | Software Engineers, Data Analysts, Data Scientists | New York, NY | Onsite, Full-time | Permanent eligibility to work in US required | B2B Fintech, Scala, Spark, React, R

Today, trillions of dollars are trapped in Excel. We believe the key to increasing liquidity is to simplify all aspects of loan and bond investment for institutional investors. Archaic databases and unstructured data make decision-making slow and inefficient. dv01 offers investors normalized data and real-time insights, putting actionable intelligence within reach.

More About us: https://dv01.co

Open positions: https://www.dv01.co/careers/
